text: @realDonaldTrump @JudgeJeanine @foxandfriends Here’s a thought, maybe put together a comprehensive plan to ensure a second wave of coronavirus can be traced and contained.  Sorry you’re feelings got hurt snowflake that a tweet was flagged, but we the people are tired of your incompetence.  Grow up.  Try and lead.
